entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 04:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
